mapper.insert: INSERT INTO S61.T6101 SET F02 = #{userId}, F03 = #{type}, F04 = #{account}, F05 = #{accountName}
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(F06,0) FROM s61.t6101 WHERE F02 = #{userId} AND F03 = 'WLZH' LIMIT 1
SELECT IFNULL(F06,0) FROM s61.t6101 WHERE F02 = #{userId} AND F03 = 'XW_INVESTOR_WLZH' LIMIT 1
SELECT IFNULL(userFree.F06, 0) FROM s61.t6101 userFree WHERE userFree.F03 = 'SDZH' AND userFree.F02 = #{userId} LIMIT 1

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(sumTemp), 0) FROM ( SELECT IFNULL(SUM(t6250.`F04`),0) AS sumTemp FROM s62.`t6250` t6250 LEFT JOIN s62.t6230 t6230 ON t6250.`F02` = t6230.`F01` WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM flb.`t_user_plan_product` tupp WHERE tupp.`tender_id` = t6250.`F01`) AND t6230.`F20` IN ('TBZ', 'DFK') AND t6250.`F03` = #{userId} AND t6230.`F38` = #{cgNum} UNION ALL
SELECT IFNULL(SUM(tup.`invest_amount`),0) AS sumTemp FROM flb.`t_user_plan` tup LEFT JOIN flb.`t_invest_plan` tip ON tup.`plan_id` = tip.`id` WHERE tip.`status` IN (4) AND tup.status IN (1) AND tup.`user_id` = #{userId} AND tip.`is_cg` = #{cgNum} ) temp

SELECT IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(temp2.`freezeInvested`, 0)), 0) + IFNULL(SUM(IFNULL(temp2.`freezeAmount`, 0)), 0) FROM ( SELECT SUM(IFNULL(temp.freezeInvested, 0)) AS freezeInvested, IF(temp.`status` IN (5, 6), (SUM(IFNULL(temp.freezeAmount,0)) - tup.invest_amount), 0) AS freezeAmount FROM ( SELECT ( CASE
WHEN tip.`status` IN (4) THEN IF((tupp.tender_id IS NOT NULL AND tupp.product_id IS NOT NULL AND tupp.product_id != 0 AND ( tupp.return_amount = 0 OR t6230.F20 NOT IN ('YJQ','YDF') )) , (IFNULL(tupp.amount, 0) - IFNULL(tupp.return_amount, 0)), 0)
WHEN tip.`status` IN (5, 6) THEN IF((tupp.tender_id IS NOT NULL AND (tupp.product_id IS NULL OR tupp.product_id = 0)), 0 - IFNULL(tupp.amount, 0), 0) END ) AS freezeInvested,
IF(tip.`status` IN (5, 6), (IFNULL(tupp.amount, 0) - IFNULL(tupp.return_amount, 0)), 0) AS freezeAmount, tup.`id` AS user_plan_id, tip.`status` FROM flb.`t_user_plan` tup LEFT JOIN flb.`t_invest_plan` tip ON tip.`id` = tup.`plan_id` LEFT JOIN flb.`t_user_plan_product` tupp ON tupp.`user_plan_id` = tup.`id`
LEFT JOIN s62.`t6250` t6250 ON t6250.F01 = tupp.tender_id LEFT JOIN s62.`t6230` t6230 ON t6250.F02 = t6230.`F01`
WHERE tup.`user_id` = #{userId} AND tup.status IN (1,2,4) ) temp LEFT JOIN flb.`t_user_plan` tup ON temp.`user_plan_id` = tup.`id` GROUP BY temp.`user_plan_id` ) temp2
